-- | Provides a MonadST class
--   
--   Provides a MonadST class
@package monad-st
@version 0.2.4


module Control.Monad.ST.Class
class Monad m => MonadST m where type family World m :: *
liftST :: MonadST m => ST (World m) a -> m a
instance (MonadTrans t, MonadST m, Monad (t m)) => MonadST (t m)
instance MonadST (ST s)
instance MonadST IO
